text: Ulassai (Ulàssa) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Nuoro in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,457 people lived there. Its area is 122.41 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 775 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Nuoro
title: Ulassai
